trans-unit.target: Disse to egenskapene skal tilordnes <xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo>og <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo>objekter som representerer samme locale.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo> </xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object that defines the writing system associated with this custom culture.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som definerer skriving systemet som er forbundet med denne egendefinerte kulturen.

trans-unit.source: This operation is not supported for replacement cultures.
trans-unit.target: Denne operasjonen støttes ikke for erstatning kulturer.

trans-unit.source: The value in a set operation is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien i en set-operasjon er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in a list separator does not range from 0 to 3.
trans-unit.target: Antallet tegn i skilletegn ikke være i området 0 til 3.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ISO 639-2 three-letter code for the language of this custom culture.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir ISO 639-2 tre bokstaver kode for språket i denne egendefinerte kulturen.

trans-unit.source: The ThreeLetterISOLanguageName property corresponds to the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.ThreeLetterISOLanguageName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ThreeLetterISOLanguageName samsvarer med den <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.ThreeLetterISOLanguageName%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.ThreeLetterISOLanguageName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the three-letter abbreviation for English is "eng".
trans-unit.target: Forkortelse på tre bokstaver for norsk er for eksempel "engelsk".

trans-unit.source: The ISO 639-2 three-letter code for the language of the current <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: ISO 639-2 tre bokstaver koden for språket i gjeldende <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objektet.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value in a set operation is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien i en set-operasjon er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The length of the value in a set operation does not range from 1 to 8 characters.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på verdien i en set-operasjon ikke mellom 1 og 8 tegn.

trans-unit.source: The value in a set operation contains a character that is not in the range "a" to "z", "A" to "Z", or "0" to "9".
trans-unit.target: Verdien i en set-operasjon inneholder et tegn som ikke er i området "a" til "z", "A", "Z" eller "0" til "9".

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the three-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tre bokstaver koden som er definert i ISO 3166 for land/område.

trans-unit.source: The ThreeLetterISORegionName property corresponds to the <xref:System.Globalization.RegionInfo.ThreeLetterISORegionName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ThreeLetterISORegionName samsvarer med den <xref:System.Globalization.RegionInfo.ThreeLetterISORegionName%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Globalization.RegionInfo.ThreeLetterISORegionName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ThreeLetterISORegionName property contains one of the three-letter codes defined in ISO 3166 for country/region.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ThreeLetterISORegionName inneholder én av tre bokstaver-koder som er definert i ISO 3166 for land/område.

trans-unit.source: For example, the three-letter code for United States is "USA".
trans-unit.target: Tre bokstaver-koden for USA er for eksempel "USA".

trans-unit.source: Case is not significant.
trans-unit.target: Case er viktig.

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.RegionName%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.TwoLetterISORegionName%2A>, and the ThreeLetterISORegionName properties contain the appropriate code in uppercase.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid den <xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.RegionName%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.TwoLetterISORegionName%2A>, og egenskapene ThreeLetterISORegionName inneholde riktig kode med store bokstaver.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.TwoLetterISORegionName%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.RegionName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The predefined country/region names are listed in the <xref:System.Globalization.RegionInfo> class topic.
trans-unit.target: Navnet som er forhåndsdefinert land/område er oppført i den <xref:System.Globalization.RegionInfo>klassen emnet.</xref:System.Globalization.RegionInfo>

trans-unit.source: The three-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region.
trans-unit.target: Tre bokstaver-kode som er definert i ISO 3166 for land/område.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the three-letter code for the language as defined in the Windows API.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tre bokstaver-koden for språket som er definert i Windows-API.

trans-unit.source: The ThreeLetterWindowsLanguageName property corresponds to the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.ThreeLetterWindowsLanguageName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ThreeLetterWindowsLanguageName samsvarer med den <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.ThreeLetterWindowsLanguageName%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.ThreeLetterWindowsLanguageName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property returns the same value as the Windows API method `GetLocaleInfo` with the LOCALE_SABBREVLANGNAME value.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer samme verdi som Windows-API-metoden `GetLocaleInfo` LOCALE_SABBREVLANGNAME-verdi.

trans-unit.source: For example, the three-letter code for English (United States) as defined in the Windows API is "enu".
trans-unit.target: Tre bokstaver-koden for engelsk (USA) som er definert i Windows-API er for eksempel "enu".

trans-unit.source: The three-letter code for the language as defined in the Windows API.

trans-unit.source: The TwoLetterISOLanguageName property corresponds to the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.TwoLetterISOLanguageName%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: In a set operation, the current custom culture is a neutral culture.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende egendefinerte kulturen er en nøytral kultur i set-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a custom culture from the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Sletter en egendefinert kultur fra den lokale datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: The Unregister method does the reverse of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.Register%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Avregistrer er motsatt av den <xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.Register%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.Register%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.Register%2A> method stores a custom culture as a file on the local computer, in the Globalization subdirectory of the directory returned by the Win32 API [GetWindowsDirectory](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191561) function.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.Register%2A>metoden lagrer egendefinerte kulturen som en fil på den lokale datamaskinen i globalisering undermappe for mappen som er returnert av Win32 API [GetWindowsDirectory](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191561) funksjonen.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.Register%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Unregister method deletes the persisted custom culture file from the computer.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Avregistrer sletter den faste egendefinerte kultur-filen fra datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: After the file is deleted, existing instances of the custom culture in computer memory continue to work, but new instances of the custom culture cannot be created.
trans-unit.target: Etter at filen er slettet, eksisterende forekomster av den egendefinerte kulturen i minnet fortsette å fungere, men kan ikke opprette ny forekomster av den egendefinerte kulturen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the custom culture to delete.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den egendefinerte kulturen skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: cultureName is a parent culture or console fallback user interface culture of a dependent culture.
trans-unit.target: cultureNameer et overordnet kultur eller konsollen fallback bruker grensesnittet kultur for en avhengige kultur.

trans-unit.source: The user does not have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren har ikke administratorrettigheter.

trans-unit.source: cultureName specifies a culture that is not found.
trans-unit.target: cultureNameAngir kulturen som ikke finnes.
